context: 2024 marked major turning point. HashiCorp changed license from MPL 2.0 to BuSL in 2023, leading to open-source forks: OpenTofu (Terraform) and OpenBao (Vault). HashiCorp was acquired by IBM in 2024. Competition expanded across infrastructure as code, secrets management, and DevOps tooling.
